page.title: 07ANCIENT MONUMENTS(2)
page.content: The {Holed stone}is in the back garden of Tolvan Cross Cottage,1 mile north of Gweek.It dates back to the Bronze Age.Once being an entrance to a burial chamber.It has been moved twice.It has been in its present place,138 years. Some think it posseses magical powers. Several mothers have put their babies through it 7 or 9 times to gaurd against rickets.Recently,other people have been cured from their illnesses by this method.The hole in the stone measures half a megalithic yard,and people have seen {blue-grey aura } lines around the huge triangular stone.If you visit it, you are asked to give it an offering.
